text:
Leonard Pietraszak (born 6 November 1936) is a Polish actor. He has appeared in more than 60 movies and television shows since 1957. He was born in Bydgoszcz, Poland. He is known for his role in the comedy television series "Czterdziestolatek".
Pietraszak also starred in "Stawka większa niż życie" (1967), "How I Unleashed World War II" (1970), "Vabank" (1981), "Danton" (1983), "Kingsajz" (1987) and "Letters to Santa" (2011).

annotations.surface_form: How I Unleashed World War II
